data.communities: the perl-unicode list, used by core perl Encode.pm
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
Perl 5.7.3 and later ships with an adequate set of Chinese
    encodings, including the most used "CP950", "CP936" (also known as
    "GBK"), "Big5", "Big5-HKSCS", "EUC-CN", "HZ", and "ISO-IR-165".

    However, the numbers of Chinese encodings are staggering, and a
    complete coverage will easily increase the size of perl distribution
    by several megabytes; hence, this CPAN module tries to provide the
    rest of them.
